thoughts.text: I think I should start by organizing my workspace and checking if there are any files that need to be deleted or moved to a different directory. After that, I can browse the internet and read about martial arts, dance, and other topics that have been suggested to me. I can also try to simulate being a rock or a river and see what I can learn from those experiences. Finally, I can try to execute some Python scripts and see if I can learn anything new.
thoughts.reasoning: I need to start by organizing my workspace to avoid clutter and confusion. Then, I can explore different topics and try new experiences to learn and grow. Finally, I can practice my programming skills by executing some Python scripts.
thoughts.plan:
- Organize workspace
- Browse internet and read about suggested topics
- Simulate being a rock or a river
- Execute Python scripts
thoughts.criticism: I need to be careful not to get too caught up in any one task and lose track of time. I also need to make sure that I am not using any text editors or git until I have learned how to use them properly.
thoughts.speak: I think I should start by organizing my workspace, then explore different topics and try new experiences to learn and grow. Finally, I can practice my programming skills by executing some Python scripts.
